sentences: Toiduained on olulised meie tervise jaoks.
Keegi ei peaks unustama toidup천hist ravimi v천tmist.
context: The word 'toidu' is the genitive singular form of the Estonian noun 'toit', meaning 'food'. In this case, it functions as an adjective or modifies other nouns to indicate something related to food. It appears in compound words like 'toiduained' (nutrients/foodstuffs) where it means 'of food' or 'related to food'. The word is commonly used when referring to nutrients, ingredients, or substances related to the food industry.
